titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 830) to rescind the unobligated funding for the FHA Refinance Program and to terminate the program.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-27, by Mr. Bishop (UT).

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Financial Services now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 14.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 150.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 186 (Roll no. 165).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 180 (Roll no. 166).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/8/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 830) to rescind the unobligated funding for the FHA Refinance Program and to terminate the program.
